_sText:
The readme contains important information so make sure you read it!

To put the landmine into your own map, simply open up the vmf in this file with hammer, then you can copy the actual landmine into your map - but be sure to read the readme!

Here is a video of the landmines in action: 

<object width="425" height="350"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/0TChxzYtSeU"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/0TChxzYtSeU" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="350"></embed></object>
